Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: EmilyAshUk
Reviews.Content: stayed 24th february weekend late valentines getaway quiet probably paris fashion week following week valentines location ideal eiffel tower outside atmosphere modern perfect little deluxe mirror bathroom half length bedroom staff pretty friendly wish french pool sauna deserted

Reviews.Title: “February 2012 - My first trip to paris”
Reviews.Author: Rachel P
Reviews.Content: trip paris boyfriend valentine’s day pleasantly surprised hotel amazing location gorgeous views eiffel tower arrived evening time dark eiffel tower lit candle cake visable hotel checked hotel staff welcoming friendly spoke english happy help 100 euro deposit aware stay aware checked arrived late hoping eat hotel’s restaurant informed reception staff monday food ds road classic found modern stylish little fixed stay wooden floor near bed raised kept tripping bathroom ceiling bathroom started dangerous stay nice fixed people staying bathroom lovely shower filled courtesy radisson products smell gorgeous loved provided dressing gowns slippers wardrobe comfythe mini bar stocked drinkssnacks pricey unfortunately paris ipodiphone doc coffee machine nice touch huge flat screen tv wall channel english bbc news issue stayed 2 nights breakfast mornings included price selection mini pastries fruit juice teacoffee portions fancy hot menu cost extra approx 810 euros portions visited hotel die classy date towels changing provided relax day walking round sights dinner overall hotels fantastic location nice staff definitely recommend hotel stay paris

Reviews.Title: “Location - amazing”
Reviews.Author: shepherdieu
Reviews.Content: cant fault location metropolitan 16th paris magical city stunning view eiffel tower balcony tired outside 10 degree weather night plus walking distance champs elysees arc de triomphe plus galleries shops location wise pretty amazing facilities wise space building narrow hotel limited 217 tight bathroom pretty space wise nespresso machine balconies views nice touch restaurant downstairs decent breakfast pool basement isnt relaxing unfortunately gym enjoyed experience probably stay 16th look alternative accommodation money spent radisson

Reviews.Title: “A great stay in Paris”
Reviews.Author: KingGents
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights radisson 2 pleasure 2 business definitely staff goes paris stay newly renovated nice bathroom breakfast menu requests fulfilled restaurant recommendations taxis

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable stay in good location”
Reviews.Author: Andy100668
Reviews.Content: hotel trocadero 10 minutes walk eiffel tower stayed 3 stay cheaper little cramped suites reasonable space found concierge desk helpful clean nicely furnished hotel rates comparable paris stay

Reviews.Content: start express satisfaction stylish elegant beeing snobby hotel time intimate personal restaurant nice evening hotel guest locals menu food awesome innovative success staff service couldnt sometimes difficult desires bar hidden gem promise miss floor atmosphere drinks friendly classy service lucky corner table eiffel tower pool offer deeply look larger renovation wasnt nice looks im little bit harder nice flaws charming pretty fixed acceptable standard little bit worn maintenance team attention decor fabrics design furnitures excellent tiny paris dosnt bad tiny feeling lovely suprisingly space shopping bags travel luggage nice standard radisson amenities bathrobes slippers nespresso machine standard appreciated location perfect silent direct access eiffel tower minutes trocadero metro station direct link gallerie lafayette printemps add minutes walk victor hugo metro station line montmatre brasseries cafés breakfast specially trocadero site view eiffel tower lovely safe taxi cdg promptly costed 40 euros definitely stay visit paris

Reviews.Title: “Chic Boutique Hotel in a Great Location”
Reviews.Author: CurryA
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights recently business experience welldesigned modern interior aesthetic free wifi nespresso machines stay hotel paris spacious agree reviews hooks towels bathroom sink form function quiet service attentive note restaurant shuts night hotel 10 min walk victor hugo plenty restaurants anyway goes paris eat hotel beautiful views eiffel tower front hotel id service amenities characteristic boutique hotel purposes definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: Lisa L
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel located close trocadero lovely view tour eiffel clean modern quiet comfortable noted mirror lights bathroom bit dark couple hooks huge difference front desk staff helpful dinner hotel restaurant superb food service bon front desk staff helpful printing short document

Reviews.Title: “Superb Boutique hotel”
Reviews.Author: theodore W
Reviews.Content: wonderful boutique hotel exceptional sevice people front desk outstanding helpful excellent suggestions superb service arranged excellent tours city tremendous job serve executive business suite ideal comfort staff extremely friendly definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel & Brilliant Staff!”
Reviews.Author: MrsTolhurst
Reviews.Content: little worried staying paris ago bad experience staff hotel arrival hotel luxury outside continues lobby attempted probably poor french explaining reservation reservation staff realised spoke english poor attempt parking automatically switched help brilliant customer service hotel friendly polite extremely helpful didnt mind english paid 30 euros parking worth busy staff car parked secure location size separate bathroom size private balcony eiffel tower am impressed hotel am staying paris wont stay else avoid breakfast 18 euros basket bakery tea coffee juice concierge indoor shopping close hotel 3 bakerys supermarket looking hotel road doors shopping centre wifi brilliant nesspresso machines amazing night paris definitely coming

Reviews.Title: “The perfect place to stay to experience Paris as its best!!!”
Reviews.Author: Chanel_Ingrid
Reviews.Content: friend arrived beautiful hotel 17th april welcomed hotels friendly helpful staff hotel extremly cozy fashionable time hotels concierge help absolutely enjoy paris location hotel excellent lovely view eiffel tower street takes breath quiet cozy nice restaurant pharmacy bank flower shop 3 minute walk trocadero metro 15 minute walk eiffel tower walking distance champs elysees feel safe walking promise fall love magnificent city hotel experience restaurant served lovely french breakfast atmosphere soothing sounds relax enjoy yourself comfortable bed bathtub air condition adjust temperature day houskeeping staff clean fresh visit paris stay hotel impression experience beautiful city highly recommend radisson blu le metropolitan hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very service oriented staff in convenient Paris location with fabulous views of the Eiffle Tower & access to other sites”
Reviews.Author: GS124
Reviews.Content: hotel staff arranged transportation service suite basic appointed comfortable modern conveniences suite course larger direct view eiffel tower location walking distance tower site restaurant meals propertys bar inviting wonderful personality staff enjoyable

Reviews.Title: “Very surprised how much I liked it!”
Reviews.Author: BNLX
Reviews.Content: stayed radisson blu march 2011 skeptical hotel due location typically stay closer marais actually liking hotel pros nice helpful staff food breakfast ala cart able eggs morning 8 euro view eiffel tower window cool surprise grocery store pastries mall grocery store 12 block 10pm wine shop selection wine cheap bottle wine 4 euro service 16 euro dinner close trocadero metro station easily heart city cafes ton sit view eiffel tower recommend bon walking distance restaurant bon hotel recommended shower awesome shower head bed bed comfortable pillow awesome house linens soft clean free internet huge lot hotels charge 30 day shopping surprised cute little boutiques neighborhood bar bar pretty late view eiffel tower cons little dark liked lighting cozy paris hotels taxis fine fitness center dont gym colleagues ran near park pool didnt check dark hard wood floors loved overall favorite paris hotels decided write shocked loved nice surprise

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic stay”

Reviews.Content: ok honest chose hotel staying raddison blu jersey week past 2 business 2 nights free goldpoints reward programme reward programmes ive arrived wasnt ready bags explore loved door hotel direct view eiffel tower walking modern art museum returned hotel 3pm told wed upgrade suite 624 worth noting cosy little suite view tower instead streets paris wasnt onsuite including black stone bath walk shower sitting table nespresso maker appreciated tea facilities nice service quick tasty penne pasta main fromage desert bit pricey line paris prices staff helpful overall lovely 2 night valentines weekend

Reviews.Content: hopeful chose hotel friends flat baby choose stay hotel instead near trocadero ive paris times stayed numerous hotels worst experience everand easily promising view eiffle tower clean nespresso machine double shower bath taking nap accosted slamming doors neighbouring staff service doors upstairs hour surrender request change request quickly kindly attended moved floor corridor floor hotel bar worries noise coming outside noise time loud air conditioning vent inside switching air kills noise didnt mind warm night rest list disappointment bearable freezing pool leaky ceiling dripping cold water lay pool broken pool tile raised floorboard trips everytime bathroom expensive soggy smoked salmon sandwich service foie gras thats gone concierge getting taxi reservation busy louvre restaurant minute gladly forgive disappointing im writing careful mere complaint observation crosses line accusation understand fault safe provided learn lesson sad heard manager visited housekeeping manager proceeded scold somehow manage feel bad realised afterward bullying 40 woman straw broke camels recommend hotel stay hotel am saddened experience £250 night hotel feel bad

Reviews.Title: “Absolultely Wonderful Hotel with Great, Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: lelash
Reviews.Content: travelled europe hotel unique design loved view eiffel tower window decorated class bed comfortable service excellent efficient staff friendly extemely helpful suggesting restaurants shopping trouble getting location paris wonderful city restaurants return paris day definitely stay le metropolitan
